entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:31 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:31 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 6:31 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
